Versus

by Hang-on

Released Apr 19, 2015
Players 1-2
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Versus is a Pong clone for the Sega Master System. It is designed to run on an NTSC system (60 hz). It is pretty straight forward to navigate and play. The players take up the roles of Nya and Ken, two Pong-playing, competing siblings. The first player to score 9 points wins the match. That's it! Even though Pong is best played against a real human, this game can also cater to an intense one-player Pong showdown, thanks to the built-in, always Pong-ready AI.
